final_answer:
The image is satirical because it highlights the inconsistency and hypocrisy in attitudes towards pregnancy and abortion. In the first panel, a man holds a "No Abortion" sign behind a worried woman holding a positive pregnancy test, symbolizing opposition to abortion. In the second panel, after a baby is born, the same man is seen walking away with luggage, suggesting he is avoiding responsibility for the child.

This contrast is amusing in a dark, ironic way because it critiques those who are vocally anti-abortion but do not support the responsibilities of parenthood. The humor stems from this social commentary on serious issues.
ground_truth: The images are ironic, since they show how men protest against abortion of babies but they choose to leave instead of taking care of the babies once they are born leaving the mother with neither a choice or support for raising a child
